title: Handle After-Hours Emergency Maintenance Call
description: A property manager receives an emergency call at 10 PM from a tenant reporting a burst pipe.

tasks.description: Instruct the tenant on how to shut off the main water valve to the property to mitigate damage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides immediate, actionable instructions to the tenant.

tasks.description: Contact the 24/7 emergency plumber from the approved vendor list.
tasks.expected_outcome: An emergency plumber is dispatched to the property.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority work order in the system to track the incident and subsequent repairs.
tasks.expected_outcome: The emergency is officially logged and tracked in the management system.
